title._content: Image taken from page 64 of 'Descriptive Sketch of the Physical Geography and Geology of the Dominion of Canada. By A. R. C. Selwyn ... and G. M. Dawson. [With folding maps.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Descriptive Sketch of the Physical Geography and Geology of the Dominion of Canada. By A. R. C. Selwyn ... and G. M. Dawson. [With folding maps.]" Author: SELWYN, Alfred Richard Cecil. Contributor: DAWSON, George Mercer. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10470.h.1." Page: 64 Place of Publishing: Montreal Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: Dawson Bros. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003334245 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
